personalInfo.name: Waheed Aslam
personalInfo.title: MERN Stack Developer
personalInfo.description: Bachelor in Computer Science | Building modern web experiences
bio: I'm a passionate MERN Stack Developer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I specialize in building modern, scalable web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.
My journey in web development combines strong technical skills with creative problem-solving. I'm dedicated to writing clean, efficient code and creating exceptional user experiences.
